name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_REGISTRY
description: This table is a bridge between registry context SmartData element values and the source registry data records.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked registry data record that is associated with the SmartData element value.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.
